parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Game 2 Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Remove all drawn links for the given editor object for the given editor,object type. Pass an empty string as param type to remove all draw,links for an object.  
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Some Old Editor Command</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> map '''removeDrawLinks''' [from,param type]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> map: [[Control]] -

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [from,param type]: [[Array]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> -

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> -
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
